--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <gestaltproject@h...> wrote:
> The room was a hangar, and the lighting was poor. One thing was
> constant, however, there was a loud clicking sound like a chain's from
> one corner, and also something like a grunting noise...
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "CatMaster o" <CatMastero@y...> wrote:
> > He snatched the datapad and took a quick glance at the number.
> > "Alright, I'll show ya that there ain't nobody tougher then ol' 
> > Quickstrike." He gloated then turned around and started towards the 
> > room.
> > "I'll show this guy a think or two," he muttered on his way. He 
> > entered the room to meet his opponet. 
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <gestaltproject@h...> wrote:
> > > Guard 3: Teeheehee! Small bot thinks he can handle us, eh? Oh!

> > > got an idea.

> > to
> > > that room and challenge the one in it.

> > > > "Why, I can slag anything that walks, slithers, crawls, flies or

> > > > > > tail glanced around.

> > form.

> > > > > > four guards.

> > > > > > > and materials to the base, and packing small freighters in
